creator: greger@alexa.com
text:
The org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.StreamPumper class has a 5ms delay in between 
every 128 bytes copied from the input to the output stream!

This causes processing of large files using the exec task to take inordinately 
long. (For example, doing a unix sort on a large file)

This problem was discussed on the ant-dev mailing list on 2002-09-08 23:42:05:
http://marc.theaimsgroup.com/?l=ant-dev&m=103152810623703&w=2

This probably explains the super slow behavior of <cvschangelog> for some 
people I suspect too... --DD
